features: 【 Powerful Light Brightness 】- This lighted makeup mirror surrounded by 72Pcs bright LED lights that can give you great assistance for making up and make you have perfect viewing while applying make up in dark or poorly lit areas. You can choose different light colors, white light, warm light and natural light according to your needs.

【 Rechargeable Illuminated Mirror 】- Built-in 1800mAh lithium battery, connect a laptop, charger or mobile power supply via Micro USB for charging, no worry about replacing batteries. Compact, lightweight, ultra thin and foldable, you can easily put it in your backpack and suitcase, fitting for home, travel or working use.

【 Multi-Function Touch Screen 】- This mirror features a high-sensitivity touch button design. LED lights brightness control by the touch sensor switch, and just touch the sensor switch to dim or bright the LED lights. Keep your finger on the switch, you can switch between 100%, 50% and 10% brightness.

【 Clear Without Distortion 】- The cosmetic mirror is made of high-quality ABS and glass, can clearly see your facial features, which is more durable than normal plastic mirrors. It perfect for makeup, shaving, brushing your teeth, exfoliating and more. And have sturdy standing, can stand stable on the table or any flat surface.

【 Regular 1X Mirror 】- Without any magnification and no deformation, no dizzy. The overall size is 25.5 x 19 cm (10 x 7.5")", and the folded thickness is 2 cm (0.8"). Perfect gift for wife, friends, mother and yourself. The travel mirror can be fixed from 90 degree to 75 degree. If you have any questions about the product, you can contact us by email and we will help you solve it.
body.description: 1800mAh LI-POLYMER BATTERY, YOU DO NOT NEED TO TAKE THE CHARGER WITH YOU. - This lighted makeup mirror uses Lifetime Energy Saving LED bulbs. Replacement bulbs are not required. What’s in the box? 1x LED makeup mirror1x USB cable1x Product instruction manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ROTATE FREELY, ILLUMINATE YOUR BEAUTY FROM DIFFERENT ANGLES. - The mirror can be fixed from 90 degree to 75 degree, provides different viewing angles for better makeup.

SMART TOUCH BUTTONS, TO MEET THE DIFFERENT BRIGHTNESS AND LIGHT SOURCES YOU NEED. - 3 Colors of lights. - Put your fingers on the light button to switch between warm, cool and daylight.- Keep your finger on the power switch, you can adjust the light brightness as per your needs.

PORTABLE SIZE, ULTRA-THIN DESIGN, SUITABLE FOR HOME OR TRAVEL. - Whether you are on the road, train, school or at home, this mirror can be easily put in your suitcase, backpack or just carry it around. And can makeup anywhere in your house, office, while camping or in your hotel room.

1800mAh LI-POLYMER BATTERY, YOU DO NOT NEED TO TAKE THE CHARGER WITH YOU. - This lighted makeup mirror uses Lifetime Energy Saving LED bulbs. Replacement bulbs are not required. What’s in the box? 1x LED makeup mirror1x USB cable1x Product instruction manual Specification: Name: Lighted vanity mirror Material: ABS + Glass Color: White Size: 25.5cm * 19cm * 2cm LED Quanity: 72pcs DC Voltage: 3.7V Power: 4.5W

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for use in applying makeup. Lightweight, folds flat (I don’t travel buy can see this being perfect for someone who does). Has a long lasting charge; have used to for three weeks now on a single charge and haven’t had to re-charge it yet. Like that is doesn’t use batteries and can charge it through USB cable, which it comes with (just need to use your own wall charger). There are three brightness options…although I generally just keep it on the brightest one. Very nice mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this for my mom for Xmas then I bought one for myself!
reviews.reviewText: I saw how much my mom uses and loves this mirror. I love that you can change the lighting to warm and how big and sturdy it is. My mom loves how compact it is, you can tuck it in a drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Travel
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my wife who travels a lot for business. Always comments on the lack of adequate lighting in hotel bathrooms. Charges fairly quickly, has multiple light tones and brightness levels. Compact and light weight. She called from her last business trip to say how much she loved the light / mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and I noticed I use my powder compact mirror a lot so I decided to get this. Travel safe, good size and led light is bright. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little mirror....
reviews.reviewText: This is a great make-up mirror, compact and sleek. It would be great for travel, folds almost flat. The light works great and it seems to hold a charge for days. I would give it five stars, but the shiny finish on the black one is almost impossible to keep clean of fingerprints. Just handling to open and close leaves ugly prints. I am constantly cleaning the outside. That's probably not a problem with other finishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: This works just as advertised. Great for traveling or at home. All pros and cons from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can break if not carful when closed
reviews.reviewText: Don’t take this in a checked bag while flying. My mirror shattered in transport but I do love this mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice make up mirror. It has two different types of light and keeps a charge for a long time. It comes packaged a nice airfield plastic container. It would be a good idea to keep that for when you’re traveling.
El regalo perfecto buen precio y magnífica calidad
Exactly what I wanted. Super easy to pack great for use at home
A great mirror with different light settings that work really well. Brought it on my trip and using it frequently. Easy to recharge and store away.

I changed it for the time allowed. Usually when I go with reviews it’s always been great, this is the first time I went with reviews and the product was below par. Whether it’s 8000k like the pamphlet says on mine or 6500k, it’s not. It’s a VERY VERY DIM 6500k. Most of my lights in my home are LED and they are 5000k my lights in my home are brighter than this light. It’s definitely a return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2023
